name: Nutch: The Punching Bag
description:
Say hello to Nutch, The Punching Ba- wait, really?

Join Nutch in his quest to get revenge for all the times he got spanked by his old owner, known as Kyosanim Robert, a legendary Taekwondo black belt. One night, all the pain that Nutch had converted itself into vital energy,  giving life to him! Who needs sense, right? There will be a rough way until you reach his dojo, so prepare to face his students and hazards!

A little message from Matth33w:

If you REALLY like the idea, consider supporting the game! Showing it to your friends  and ask them to give a try is the best way! You will be helping me a lot!

-Matt

Controls

Arrows - Move

Z-Key - Jump

X-Key - Run

C-Key - Punching

Go support Julian (the game composer) for the hard work on the soundtrack!

Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/dj-donut-fox/

Have a fun time playing!
